altTitles.ja: ねずみの初恋

description.en:
Nezumi is a girl who was raised as a hitman by the yakuza and grew up not knowing human love. An ordinary young man, Ao, knows nothing. They fall in love and start to live together, but the evil hand is close at hand... This is a story of first love, so cruel and so sad.

Read the prequel oneshot featuring Messiah-chan's backstory [here](https://mangadex.org/title/a53ff4b3-1514-4b91-9fa0-acd99dd797de/gomennasai-messiah-chan).
description.fr: Nezumi est une fille qui a été élevée comme tueuse à gages par les yakuzas et qui a grandi sans connaître l'amour humain. Un jeune homme ordinaire, Ao, n'en sait rien. Ils tombent amoureux et commencent à vivre ensemble, mais la main du mal est proche.... C'est l'histoire d'un premier amour, si cruel et si triste.
description.ja: ヤクザに殺し屋として育てられ、人の愛を知らずに育った少女、ねずみ。何も知らない普通の青年、碧(あお)。二人は恋に落ち、共に暮らし始めるが、魔の手はすぐそこまで迫っていた‥‥。
description.pt-br:
Nezumi, uma garota criada como uma assassina pela yakuza, cresceu sem conhecer o amor humano. Ao, um jovem comum, não sabe nada sobre o passado sombrio dela. Mesmo assim, eles se apaixonam e começam a viver juntos, mas o perigo está à espreita... Esta é uma história de um primeiro amor, tão cruel e triste.

Leia o oneshot prequel, que conta a história de origem da Messiah-chan, [aqui](https://mangadex.org/title/a53ff4b3-1514-4b91-9fa0-acd99dd797de/gomennasai-messiah-chan).

Pの悲劇 高橋留美子傑作集
義理のバカンス
赤い花束
運命の鳥

高橋留美子傑作集：紅色花束

description.en:
A sophisticated collection of tales, ranging from the macabre to heartwarming to wacky. The trials and tribulations of daily life.  
  
Volume 1: P no Higeki (released 1994)  
1. P no Higeki (The Tragedy of P)  
2. Roman no Akindo (The Merchant of Romance)  
3. Poi no Ie (The House of Trash)  
4. Hachi no Naka (Hidden in the Pottery)  
5. Hyakunen no Koi (One Hundred Years of Love)  
6. L-size no Shiawase (Extra-Large Sized Happiness)  
  
  
Volume 2: Senmu no Inu (released 1997)  
1. Semmu no Inu (The Director's Dog)  
2. Meisou Kazoku Fire (The Astray 'F' Family)  
3. Kimi ga Iru dake de (As Long as You Are Here)  
4. Chanoma no Love Song (Living Room Love Song)  
5. Oyaji Low Teen (Teen Papa)  
6. Orei ni Kaete (As Way of Thanks)  
  
Volume 3: Akai Hanataba (released 2005)  
1. One Day Dream  
2. Graffiti Pop  
3. Dutiful Vacation / Giri no Vacance / Holiday-In-Law / A Compulsory Holiday (婆婆的假期)  
4. Help  
5. Red Bouquet  
6. Permanent Love  
  
Volume 4: Unmei no Tori (released 2011)  
  
Volume 5: The Witch and the Dinner (released 2019)

Volume 6: The Power of Money (released 2024)

altTitles.ja: くうちゃんが行く！

description.en: Cute short story about Kuuchan the cat and his adventures at the animal hospital.

title.en: Heimin Shusshin no Teikoku Shoukan, Munou na Kizoku Joukan wo Juurin shite Nariagaru

altTitles.ja: 平民出身の帝国将官、無能な貴族上官を蹂躙して成り上がる

altTitles.en: The Rising of the Commoner-Origin Officer: Beat up All the Incompetent Noble Superiors!
The Commoner-Born Imperial General Officer Rises Through the Ranks by Crushing His Incompetent Noble Superiors.

altTitles.id: Pemberontakan Sang Perwira Rakyat Biasa: Berantas Semua Bangsawan Atas Tidak Becus

description.en:
All the bosses are annoying! The reincarnated strongest magician's trampling and subjugation begins!

Hazen Heim, a newly appointed imperial general, is demoted to the front line because he is a commoner. There were a lot of incompetent people, such as "a trash superior who takes advantage of his position to steal the achievements of his subordinates", "an evil subordinate who keeps bullying people below him", and "a top who is too opportunistic to do anything''. 

However, Hazen has the experience and overwhelming ability as the strongest magician that he cultivated in his previous life. He slaughters his malevolent subordinates in accordance with military law, and completely refutes his superiors who complain. He achieved extraordinary results, such as making peace with a hostile tribe by teaming up with a genius girl, and defeated all the annoying bosses!

An exhilarating upstart fantasy about an unscrupulous superior!
description.ja: 新任帝国将官のヘーゼンは平民出身を理由に最前線に左遷、そこは無能の上官ばかりであった。だが彼には前世で培った、最強魔法使いとしての経験と圧倒的実力がある。

title.en: It's Over! Empress' Husband Is Actually Invincible

altTitles.zh: 完了啊！女帝的软饭丈夫居然无敌

altTitles.zh-ro: Wanliao Ah! Nvdi De Ruan Fan Zhangfu Juran Wudi

description.en: Xiao Tian, a human on earth, was summoned by Empress Zi Ruoyan to the Great Yan Dynasty to become her husband at the time of life and death, and got a "Strongest Supreme System", but Xiao Tian only wanted to be the ultimate soft rice prince of the Empress! So he resolutely rejected the system, but he didn't expect that the strong system's style of painting would suddenly change into a "dog-licking system"? ! 【You are a creature from the super high-dimensional plane Earth! 】【This system can only be your slave! 】【Master, please control yourself, you may accidentally kill this system! 】

altTitles.ja: 傭兵団の料理番

description.en: The story begins when Azuma Akari, a young man with an ambition to be a chef, trips into another world. Akari is picked up by Gangreve, the leader of a mercenary group. Akari joins the group as an odd job and gradually increases his own value by demonstrating his cooking skills. Each leader of the mercenary group is a quirky character, but Akari connects with them through his cooking. By improving the mercenary group's food situation and occasionally helping with inventions, Akari is gradually recognized by his fellow members of the mercenary group. However, Akari does not yet know that he will become a hero.
description.ja: 料理人志望の青年・東朱里が異世界にトリップしたところから物語は始まる。朱里を拾ったのは、傭兵団の団長、ガングレイブ。雑用として傭兵団に身を寄せる朱里は、徐々に料理の腕を振るうことで自らの存在価値を高めていく。傭兵団の各隊長たちは一癖も二癖もある人物揃いだったが、朱里は料理を通じて彼らと心を通じ合わせていった。傭兵団の食事事情を改善し、時に発明を手伝ったりと少しずつ、朱里は傭兵団の仲間たちに認められていくのだった。しかし、朱里はまだ知らない。自分自身が英雄として語られる存在になることを…。

altTitles.pt-br: O guia de sobrevivência do extra da academia
O guia de sobrevivência do figurante da academia

altTitles.es-la: Guía de supervivencia del extra de la academia

altTitles.en: How to Survive at the Academy

description.en:
Ed Rothstaylor is a third-rate villain in a game, disowned by his family and kicked out of the dormitory for his misdeeds. One day, our main character wakes up as this very Ed, and realizes he must earn a scholarship so he can graduate and be set for life. 

Now living in the woods, he resolves to keep away from the protagonists, but four of the female leads just won't leave him alone. Not only that, his presence starts to change the timeline and events of the game! 

Can Ed help the story progress while staying out of the limelight?
description.ko:
즐겨하던 게임의 삼류 엑스트라 악역으로 빙의했다.
야망은 없고 그냥 조용히 살고 싶다. 근데 세상이 참 살아남기 힘들다.
주인공이 할 수 없는 삼류 악역의 방식으로, 난 이 이야기의 끝을 맞이하기 위해 살아남는다!
description.pt-br: Eu possuía um personagem vilão extra de terceira categoria em meu jogo favorito. Não tenho ambições e só quero viver uma vida tranquila. Mas, caramba, este mundo é um lugar difícil de sobreviver. Eu sobreviverei até o final desta história, de uma forma que o protagonista não conseguirá. Sobreviverei à maneira de um personagem vilão de terceira categoria.

altTitles.ja-ro: Mob na Ore no Gyakuten Jinsei

altTitles.en: The Reversal of My Life as a Mob Character
The Reversal of My Life as a Side Character

altTitles.ru: Моя жизнь в толпе в обратном направлении

altTitles.ja: モブな俺の逆転人生

description.en:
Amid a repetitive and boring everyday life, a game appeared as if it were fate - "Heroes Destiny". After spending ten years playing it, I finally completed the game, but all that remained was the emptiness of having to return to an ordinary life. At that moment, a message appeared on the screen:

"Do you desire a new adventure?"

[Yes/No]

Little did I know that I would wake up in an unfamiliar body and an unknown place.

"Remember, I am now Calix Shaekin."

And thus…

"I will become the protagonist of this world!"

altTitles.ja: ときめけ魔法幼女ココピュア

description.en: Spin-off of Onee-san wa Joshi Shougakusei ni Kyoumi ga arimasu. Same degeneracy, but with magical girls.

title.en: Kago no Naka no Ryuu Seijo

altTitles.ja: 籠のなかの竜聖女 ―虐げられた伯爵令嬢は、今日も溺愛されています
Kago no Naka no Ryuu Seijo: Shiitagerareta Hakushaku Reijou wa, Kyou mo Dekiaisareteimasu

description.en:
“Even though I was supposed to have been rejected for marriage once…?!”
The Dragon Saintess, tasked with caring for the black dragon “Gramvint,” who protects the Kingdom of Elvasti, is the official fiancée of the kingdom’s prince. The current Dragon Saintess, “Ludia,” has dedicated her life since childhood to taking care of the enormous dragon that resides in a giant cage. She was also engaged to the prince, “Edik.”

However, one day, “Edik” suddenly summoned “Ludia” and informed her of her dismissal as the Dragon Saintess and the annulment of their engagement. To her shock, the new Dragon Saintess was her stepsister, “Leila.” What’s more, “Edik” told her that her next destination would be marriage to the Black General, “Wilfried.” But “Wilfried” rejected the marriage, saying, “You and I are not a good match”…?!

altTitles.zh: 万人厌的魔女大小姐与男装皇子的婚约

altTitles.zh-hk: 萬人厭的魔女大小姐與男裝皇子的婚約

altTitles.ru: Помолвка презираемой ведьмы и переодетой принцессы

altTitles.ko: 미움받는 마녀 영애와 남장 황자의 약혼

description.en:
Vilified by others as a "witch", Evris, the youngest daughter of the House of Bradley, is engaged to Mark, the fifth prince of the Kingdom of Klengel. When he abruptly announces that their engagement is broken off, Evris is plunged into despair. However, someone reaches out to her instead... The cross-dressing crown prince (♀) of a neighboring country!?

This is the story of a red-haired witch who manipulates shadows and a cross-dressing crown prince (♀) who is serving as a body double for her missing older brother. 

The curtain rises on a fantasy romantic comedy of a girl being teased by a princess!

Serialization began in the July 2023 issue of *Yuri Hime*.
description.ja:
「魔女」と罵られるブラッドリー家の末娘・イヴリスは、婚約相手であるクレンゲル王国第5王子・マルクに突然の婚約破棄を宣言されていた。絶望のどん底に落とされるイヴリス。しかし、そんな彼女に手を差し伸べるのは…隣国の男装皇太子!?
影を操る赤髪の魔女令嬢と失踪した兄の影武者となる男装皇子。
王子様系女子に翻弄されるファンタジーラブコメ開幕！
description.ru:
Эйвери, младшая дочь дома Брэдли, проклинаемая окружающими как "ведьма", помолвлена с Марком, пятым принцем королевства Кленгель. Когда он неожиданно объявляет, что их помолвка расторгнута, Эйвери впадает в отчаяние. Однако кто-то протягивает ей руку помощи... Наследный принц (♀) соседней страны?!

Это история о ведьме, управляющей тенями, и о переодетом наследном принце (♀), который является двойником пропавшего старшего брата.

Занавес приподнимается над фэнтезийной романтической комедией о девушке, которую дразнит принцесса!
description.tr:
Bu, gölgeleri manipüle eden kızıl saçlı bir cadı ile kayıp ağabeyinin dublörü olarak rol yapan melez veliaht prensin hikâyesidir.

Diğerleri tarafından “cadı” olarak lanetlenen Bradley Hanesi’nin en küçük kızı Evris, Klengel Krallığı’nın beşinci prensi Mark ile nişanlıdır. Mark aniden nişanı bozduğunu açıklayınca Evris umutsuzluğa kapılır. Ancak biri ona yardım elini uzatacaktır… Komşu ülkelerden birinin karşı cinsin kıyafetlerini giymeyi seven veliaht prensi!? Bir prenses tarafından dalga geçilen bir kızın fantastik romantik komedisinde perde açılıyor!

altTitles.ja: 彼女の友達

description.en: He got a cute girlfriend who was the first in his life, but her friend tempted him with a body that was lewder than her... What would you do if your girlfriend's friend pressed you like this?
description.ja: 人生で初めてできた、かわいい彼女。でもその友達は、彼女よりも豊満なカラダで僕を誘惑してきて…。彼女の友達にこんな風に迫られたら、あなたはどうしますか？
description.vi: Lần đầu tiên trong đời tôi có một cô bạn gái vô cùng dễ thương nhưng bạn cô ấy luôn cố dùng thân hình nóng bỏng của mình để cám dỗ tôi, phải làm sao đây?

altTitles.ja: 支配少女くばるちゃん

description.en:
After fierce bullying, Yuuto Kiba wanted to die. On the verge of committing suicide, his fate changes rapidly when a strange and funky beautiful girl, Kubaru, tells him, “Give me your life”.

Make your life happy with love?! A slightly strange and psycho love drama.
description.ja:
熾烈ないじめの末に、もう死にたいと思っていた少年・木場優人（きばゆうと）。自殺する寸前に、奇妙なファンキー美少女・くばるに「君の人生を頂戴」と言われたことで、運命が目まぐるしく変わっていく。

ラブで君の人生を幸せにする？！ちょっと奇妙でサイコなラブドラマ。

title.en: A Pair of Childhood Friends Who Were Put into One of "Those" Rooms

altTitles.ja: 例の部屋にいれられちゃった幼馴染の2人

altTitles.ja-ro: Rei no Heya ni Irerarechatta Osananajimi no Futari

title.en: Seijo no Maryoku wa Bannou desu

altTitles.ja: 聖女の魔力は万能です

altTitles.en: The Saint's Magic Power Is Omnipotent

altTitles.th: สตรีศักดิ์สิทธิ์อิทธิฤทธิ์สารพัดอย่าง

altTitles.ru: сэйдзё но марёку ва банно: дэсу

altTitles.en: The Power of the Saint Is All Around

description.de:
Nach einem langen Arbeitstag wird die Mitte-20-jährige Sei Takanashi in ihrem Hausflur von einem grellen Licht umhüllt und findet sich plötzlich in einer Parallelwelt wieder. Schuld an ihrer unfreiwilligen Reise ist das »Ritual zur Beschwörung der Heiligen Maid« am dortigen Königshof. Jene Maid soll die Kraft besitzen, die in diese Welt einfallenden Monster auszulöschen. Neben Sei ist mit Aira Misono noch eine zweite Frau erschienen, die vom Kronprinzen Kyle prompt zur Auserwählten bestimmt wird. Verstoßen und unfähig, nach Japan zurückzukehren, beginnt für Sei ein neues Leben in Slantania. Als Forscherin am Institut für Heilpflanzen findet sie schließlich eine neue Berufung. Da ihre magischen Tränke ungewöhnlich stark sind, kommt die Vermutung auf, dass sie doch die Heilige Maid sein könnte.

---

description.en:
Sei, a 20 year old office worker, is summoned to a different world after finishing some overtime work. But the person who had summoned her looks at her face and said, “This is not the Saint.” Instead, the other summoned lady is lauded as the Saint, while Sei is ignored.

Offended at being discarded without a second thought, Sei leaves the royal palace and looks for occupation, and she starts working at a laboratory where she makes potions and cosmetics. She uses her magic to grant people’s requests and slowly people begin suspecting that she is the actual Saint…

Can Sei enjoy her slow dreamy different-world life without her saint title being found out?!
description.fr:
Sei, une accro au travail, se retrouve invoquée par erreur dans un autre monde lors d'un rituel qui a pour but d'invoquer une Sainte qui pourra éradiquer tous les démons. Après son arrivée, seule l'autre jeune fille invoquée en même temps est emmenée voir le Prince. Après avoir quitté le palais, Sei commence à travailler dans un laboratoire de recherches et découvre cette nouvelle vie.

---

description.it:
Sei, un'impiegata di 20 anni, viene convocata in un altro mondo dopo aver terminato gli straordinari. Ma la persona che l'aveva convocata le dice che non è la santa. Invece, all'altra donna evocata, viene riconosciuto questo titolo, mentre Sei viene ignorata. Offesa per essere stata scartata senza pensarci due volte, Sei lascia il palazzo reale e cerca occupazione, e inizia a lavorare in un laboratorio dove prepara pozioni e cosmetici. Usa la sua magia per soddisfare le richieste delle persone che lentamente iniziano a sospettare che lei sia la vera Santa... Riuscirà Sei a godersi la sua vita da sogno, in un altro mondo, senza che il suo titolo di santa venga scoperto?!

description.ru:
Сей, 20 лет. Была призвана в другой мир после сверхурочной работы. Но человек, который призвал ее, посмотрел и сказал: «Это не святая». Разве это не пренебрежение? С самого начала Сей решила покинуть дворец и начать работать в Исследовательском центре Зелий. Она мирно жила, создавая зелья и косметику. Она помогала людям своей магией и постепенно, они начали подозревать, что она святая. Сможет ли она и дальше жить спокойной жизнью?

title.en: Dungeon ni Hisomu Yandere na Kanojo ni Ore wa Nando mo Korosareru

altTitles.ja: ダンジョンに潜むヤンデレな彼女に俺は何度も殺される

altTitles.en: My Yandere Girlfriend Lurks in the Dungeon and Kills Me Over and Over Again

altTitles.ko: 던전에 숨어든 얀데레 그녀에게 나는 몇 번이고 죽는다

altTitles.ru: Моя Девушка-Яндере, Прячущаяся в Подземелье, Убивает Меня Снова и Снова

altTitles.vi: Tôi bị bạn gái đâm chết hết lần này đến khác

description.en:
A fantasy story about Kiska, a boy who is mistreated by the villagers. He manages to survive thanks to his childhood friend Namia, who was the only one by his side. One day, Namia is murdered by three men, and Kiska is accused of the crime and banished to an inescapable class S dungeon. However, he finds himself in a different world where he can use "Save and Reset" to get back on his feet no matter how many times he dies. The story is about Kiska's quest for revenge against those who wronged him and his friend
___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/62546)
description.ja:
何度死んだって、何度倒れたって、やり直す――！

冤罪により脱出不可能な高難易度ダンジョンの奥地へ追放された、なんの変哲もない男・キスカ。絶望する間もなく、突然モンスターに殺されるその寸前、＜セーブ＆リセット＞のスキルが付与されて……！？

title.en: Ohitorisama ni wa Naremashita no de. Konyakusha Houchi-chuu!

altTitles.ja: おひとり様には慣れましたので。婚約者放置中！

altTitles.ja-ro: Ohitorisama ni wa Naremashita no de. Konyakusha Houchichuu!

altTitles.en: Since I've Gotten Used to Being Alone, I'm Ignoring My Fiancé!

altTitles.zh-hk: 已經習慣一個人了。訂婚對象放置中！

altTitles.zh: 已经习惯一个人了。订婚对象放置中！

description.en: Countess Nicole's fiance, Chaos, is always by his childhood friend, Princess Caroline's side. As a result of being constantly neglected by Chaos, Nicole has awakened to the idea of ​​being alone, thinking, "If that's what he likes, then I should do what I like too!"...? While Nicole has discovered the ease of being alone, Chaos, on the other hand, doesn't seem to understand the seriousness of the situation...? The long-awaited comic adaptation of the slapstick love comedy of Chaos and Nicole, whose mutual unrequited love has become complicated!

Seongwu is a former special forces soldier who has returned to college after completing his national service. His ordinary life as a student is shattered during class one day when he and his fellow students are faced with a mysterious prompt asking them to “select a role.”

Seongwu chooses the necromancer, a rare ability that grants him the power to control the undead.

With the campus and outside world seemingly on the brink of collapse, Seongwu must use his newfound powers to battle fearsome monsters and help save his fellow students. But will they make it out alive?

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/silingfashiwanglingzhipeizhe/list?title_no=1981)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/lone-necromancer/list?title_no=3619)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/the-lone-necromancer/list?title_no=4063)
description.fr:
"Quel est le métier le plus utile pour survivre dans un monde en ruine ?". Cette question apparaît devant Seong-woo alors qu'il somnole en cours. Lui et les autres étudiants ont 15 secondes pour choisir une carte parmi celles qui sont apparues devant eux. Celle choisie déterminera leurs pouvoirs qui leur permettront de survivre dans un monde chaotique, qui ressemble fortement à un jeu vidéo. Pour sa part, Seong-woo sera un nécromancien !

Pekerjaan apa yang akan kau pilih untuk bertahan hidup saat dunia hancur oleh monster-monster yang tiba-tiba bermunculan?! Setelah memilih 'Necromancer' sebagai pekerjaannnya, Sungwoo dapat menjadikan monster yang telah ia kalahkan menjadi pengikutnya!

description.ko:
곧 세상이 멸망한다.
전설 속에나 나올 법한 몬스터들이 각지에 출현한다.
그리고 사람들을 잡아먹고, 길거리를 점령하며, 빌딩과 지하철에 던전을 만들기 시작한다.

멸망한 세계에서 살아남기 위해 단 한 가지 직업을 고를 수 있다.
당신은 무슨 직업을 고르겠는가?
"네크로맨서"

나에게는 멸망이 무대이고, 죽음이 자산이 된다.

description.ru:
Мир на грани разрушения. Существа, упоминания о которых встречались лишь в мифах и легендах, теперь заполоняют города, обживаются под людскими жилищами и в метро, пожирая всё живое.
А что до человечества… Ему будет предложено занять новую роль в нынешнем мире выживания.
Сонву выбрал класс «некромант», и теперь трупы, что обагряют Землю, ему только на руку.

魔物侵袭，世界灭亡在即！
退役特种兵的降维打击！
某一天，只存在于传说中的魔物们突然出现，肆意地破坏街道、撕咬人类，并且在高楼和地铁建立起了自己的巢穴…如果在灭亡的世界，能够选择一个职业，你会选择哪种职业呢？对于身为“死灵法师”的刘成宇来说，灭亡即是舞台，丧生即为资产。

title.en: Danshi Kokoseidakedo Gyaru ni TS Shimashita

altTitles.ja: 男子高校生だけどギャルにTSしました

altTitles.ja-ro: Danshi Koukousei Dakedo Gal ni TS Shimashita

altTitles.en: I'm a High School Boy, but I Got Gender-Swapped into a Gyaru

altTitles.pt-br: Eu sou um Garoto do Ensino médio, mas troquei de Gênero e Me Tornei uma Gal

description.en:
Junpei, a loner high schooler, became a gyaru after saving the god of gyaru from drowning. Through his mother's connections, he was able to transfer to an all-girls school, but it was stuffed to the brim with gyarus! Every day is a sensory overload for Shunpei, who's never even talked to a girl, let alone a gyaru.
___
 [Alternative Official Raw (NicoNico)](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/67976)
description.ja: 陰キャ男子・桜井は、目の前で溺れていたギャル神様を助けた恩恵でギャルになってしまった。母親の伝手で転校することができたが、その学校はギャルだらけの女子校だった！ギャルどころか女子とまともに交流したことがない桜井にとって刺激が強すぎる毎日…。
description.pt-br:
Shunpei, um estudante solitário do ensino médio, se tornou uma gal depois de salvar a deusa das gals de se afogar. Através das conexões de sua mãe, ele conseguiu transferir-se para uma escola só para meninas, mas estava cheia de gals!
 Todos os dias são uma sobrecarga sensorial para Shunpei, que nunca falou com uma garota, muito menos com uma gal.
 
 É o início de uma comédia escolar engraçada, com um cara introvertido do ensino médio => transformado em Gal.

altTitles.ja: アンダーニンジャ

description.en: The once-prosperous Japanese ninja are said to have been dismantled by the GHQ following the Pacific War and disappeared. In reality, the ninja still exist in secret, and their number is rumored to be as many as 200,000. Some of the elite ninja work behind the scenes at the national level. On the other hand, the ninja at the end of the line are often unable to find work. One such ninja, Kuro Kumogakure, is living the life of a NEET.

title.en: Blue Archive x Kamen Rider Decade - Story of Tsukasa Kadoya Sensei in Schale (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: シャーレの門矢士先生概念

altTitles.vi: Blue Archive x Kamen Rider Decade - Câu chuyện về thầy giáo Schale Kadoya Tsukasa

description.en: Anyone who is a fan of the Kamen Rider genre probably knows Kamen Rider Decade, also known as Kadoya Tsukasa;  world destroyer... The story is about Decade working as a sensei in the Blue Archive world

altTitles.th: ชายเลวหมื่นลี้ทานตะวัน

altTitles.ja: 負けヒロイン救済計画

description.en:
Why torment scumbags for just a moment when you can do so forever? Join Su LuXia as she transmigrates into countless worlds with her ‘Supporting Female Character’s Counterattack System’ to unleash vengeance upon the deplorable male and female leads using a variety of tactics! 

Su LuXia: "The only thing that brings me comfort is the tears of remorse from scumbag men and the agonizing groans of despicable women who can't get what they want." 

System: "Has My Esteemed Host learnt to reel back her vengeful spirit? Nope, I guess not."
description.fr:
Su Lüxia fait partie d'un "Système de rôle féminin".
Sa mission : en se téléportant dans les corps des femmes trompées et bafouées, elle renverse leur destinée.
"Seules les larmes d'un bâtard de tricheur et les gémissements de douleur d'une garce m'apportent le réconfort."
description.it:
Schiacciare un verme per un solo momento dà una soddisfazione momentanea, ma le vite passate a schiacciare i vermi forniscono vite di soddisfazione continua. Su Lüxia, la nostra protagonista femminile, trasmigra in altri mondi con il sistema di contrattacco della seconda protagonista femminile; usa schemi e trucchi elaborati per picchiare innumerevoli bastardi traditori e puttane.

Su Lüxia: "Solo le lacrime di rimorso di un bastardo traditore, e i gemiti di dolore di una puttana incapace di ottenere ciò che vuole, mi danno conforto."

Sistema: "Il mio ospite ha attinto alla sua umanità oggi? No."

altTitles.ja: ディディアディクション

description.en: Asato, a high school student with a strong sense of justice, is investigating small pranks that frequently occur at school and comes across the newly appointed school nurse, Egou Nemu. Nemu is admired by everyone at school because of her beauty, but she has a curt attitude towards everyone. However, when Asato learns Nemu's secret, he is invited to Nemus home. Asato is at the mercy of Nemu, who has a sweet attitude that he doesn't show during the day, but there is an even more important secret―in that room.
description.ja: 正義感の強い高校生のアサトは学校で頻発する小さなイタズラを調査していたところ、新任の養護教諭・江郷ネムに行きつく。その美貌から学校中の憧れの的であるネムだが、誰に対してもそっけない態度をとっていた。しかしアサトがネムの秘密を知ったことで、ネムの自宅へ誘われる。昼間には見せない甘い態度のネムに翻弄されるアサトだったが、その部屋にはさらなる重大な秘密があった――。

title.en: Hone Hime Rosalie: Shisha no Saigo o Tsuitai-ken Shi, Chikara o Hikitsugu

altTitles.en: Rosalie, the Bone Princess: Experiencing the Last Moments of the Dead and Inheriting Their Power.

altTitles.ja: 骨姫ロザリー ～死者の最期を追体験し、力を引き継ぐ～

description.en:
Rosalie, a girl capable of communicating with the dead, is ostracized by society due to her unique ability. She lives in isolation, working as an investigator who gleans critical information from the deceased unearthed in ancient ruins. Her life takes a dramatic turn when she encounters the remains of Hugo, a once-legendary death knight. Through their connection, she inherits his extraordinary powers. This marks the beginning of her journey as "Bone Princess," a figure destined to influence the world.

The story blends supernatural mystery with epic fantasy, focusing on themes of acceptance, legacy, and the power of understanding the past.

title.en: A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal~〈Fan Colored〉

altTitles.ja: 男女比1:39の平行世界は思いのほか普通

altTitles.ja-ro: Danjohi 1:39 no Heikou Sekai wa Omoi no Hoka Futsuu

description.en: Satou Sou is accidentally swapped with himself in a parallel world with a male/female ratio of 1:39. He finds a kind family and lovely women at the place where he was switched. Seeing the outside of these women, he's relieved to see that the number of men and women has changed, but not much else. However, their inner lives are filled with conflicts and troubles.

Chu Rong x Xu Yehuai

Xu Yehuai, a social animal, once became a vicious villain who was made into sashimi by the tyrant male protagonist of a cool novel.

In order to survive, he pretended to have amnesia.

Who knew that the violent male protagonist changed his normal crazy and called him "adoptive father"?

The tyrant who was supposed to kill him turned into a loyal dog, caring for him, obeying him in everything, and aggrievedly said that they had "that kind of" relationship! ! ?

Chu Rong approached with suspicion and temptation, and personally laid a trap full of flowers for him, watching him step by step into his own cage, but why was he the one who fell into pain in the end?

A conspiracy that uses love as a game, only until the end can we tell who is the real winner.

TLer: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PL8lurieGcrLgh4Pmm9YQPcJ7nhRiBB0nn&feature

title.ja: Silent Witch Chinmoku no Majo no Kakushigoto

altTitles.ja: サイレント・ウィッチ 沈黙の魔女の隠しごと

description.en:
Monica Everett is revered as “The Silent Witch.” She’s the only magician in the world who can use magic without an incantation... In reality though, she’s just shy— the only reason she practiced chantless magic was so that she wouldn't have to speak in public! Before even realizing her own talent, Monica is chosen as one of the “Seven Sages,” and is assigned the secret mission of protecting the kingdom’s second prince...?

The antisocial young prodigy will have to hide her true nature while secretly rescuing the prince from encroaching danger in this thrilling fantasy story!
description.es:
Monica Everett es venerada como «La Bruja Silenciosa». Es la única maga del mundo que puede usar la magia sin conjuros... En realidad, es tímida: ¡la única razón por la que practicaba magia sin encantamientos era para no tener que hablar en público! Antes incluso de darse cuenta de su propio talento, Mónica es elegida como uno de los «Siete Sabios», ¿y se le asigna la misión secreta de proteger al segundo príncipe del reino...?

La antisocial joven prodigio tendrá que ocultar su verdadera naturaleza mientras rescata en secreto al príncipe del peligro que la acecha en esta emocionante historia de fantasía.
description.id: Keajaiban tidak membutuhkan nyanyian. Ini adalah kisah tentang penyihir terlemah, paling pemalu, namun terkuat, dan bagaimana dia dilahirkan kembali, semuanya menjadi sebuah buku. (Penyihir Keheningan) Monica Everett. Satu-satunya penyihir di dunia yang bisa menggunakan sihir diam (tanpa nyanyian), dan seorang pahlawan muda yang membunuh sendiri naga hitam legendaris itu. Tapi apa sifat aslinya?? Alasan sebenarnya saya berlatih sihir diam adalah agar saya tidak perlu berbicara di depan umum. Ketika Monica terpilih sebagai salah satu dari 7 Watchers, tanpa disadari, dia terpaksa mengambil misi rahasia untuk melindungi pangeran kedua…? Lemah dan pemalu, namun yang terkuat. Penyihir surgawi yang antisosial menyembunyikan identitas aslinya dan diam-diam membawa kejahatan ke pengadilan melawan pangeran dalam fantasi yang menyakitkan! Fantasi penyihir web, terlahir kembali menjadi sebuah buku, dengan tambahan! Apa yang akan menjadi misteri baru yang berdiri di depan Monica Everett…?

altTitles.en: Don't Mess With the Film Club!

altTitles.ja: 映像研には手を出すな！

altTitles.ja-ro: Eizouken ni wa Te o Dasu na!
Eizouken ni ha Te wo Dasu na!

description.en:
Asakusa Midori wants to create an anime, but she's too disheartened to make that first step by herself. But by pure chance, she meets Mizusaki Tsubame, an up-and-coming socialite secretly dreaming of becoming an animator. Together with Midori's money-loving best friend Kanamori Sayaka, the energetic trio slowly work towards making their "ultimate world" a reality!
___

altTitles.ja: スーパーボールガールズ

description.en: Ichiyoshi continues to work at a chocolate factory, locking away his "best" in his heart. One Christmas night, on his way home, he finds a mysterious superball that rolls out of the darkness...
description.ja: 人生で自分にとっての「一番」をずっと心にしまい続けながら、チョコレート工場での仕事を続ける一好瑛太。クリスマスの夜、帰宅中の彼は暗闇から転がる不思議なスーパーボールを手にする。日常への様々な思いをぶつけるように、そのボールを思い切り投げつけた彼の前にいきなり現れたのは理想の「美女」．．．！？
description.pt-br: Ichiyoshi continua trabalhando em uma fábrica de chocolate, trancando o seu "melhor" em seu coração. Numa noite de Natal, a caminho de casa, ele encontra uma misteriosa super bola que  cai da escuridão...

altTitles.ja-ro: Magika no Kenshi to Shoukan Maou

altTitles.ja: 魔技科の剣士と召喚魔王

altTitles.zh-hk: 魔技科的劍士與召喚魔王

altTitles.th: จอมดาบมนตรากับราชาอัญเชิญ

altTitles.zh: 魔技科的剑士与召唤魔王

altTitles.ja-ro: Ma-waza-ka no Kenshi to Shōkan Maō

description.en:
15 years ago the world discovered magic as well as mythical beings (basically beings from various legends) in another dimension. Humankind learned to summon these dangerous mythical beings and use their power to great effect. 7 countries formed contracts with these "Diva" and gained their alligence as a result. Diva will chose their summoners on their 14th birthday and give them a stigma. Schools have been set up to train summoners and magical swordsman (basically bodyguards that give the summoners time to cast their spell) as a result.  
  
15 years later after the finding of magic Hayashizaki Kazuki is chosen as a summoner and given a stigma to indicate that. This is surprising since males aren't chosen as summoners due to their low amount of mana compared to females. As the first male to be a summoner Kazuki is under a lot of scrutiny by almost everyone.  
  
To complicate matters his sister (who's a magical swordsman) is against him going into summoner school to train there as a summoner. Because summoners and magical swordsman have a cat mouse thing going on where summoners look down on magical swordsman as inferior so his sister naturally is against him going there. She'll stop him even if it means going to war.  
  
Kazuki however is determined to thrive in summoner school and have already determined to give it his all. Even if he's the lowest ranked student (ranked E) and his fellow students intend to demean him he'll prove himself as the strongest summoner.  
  
Adaptation of the light novel written by Mihara Mitsuki and illustrated by CHuN.  
  
The manga is published in Monthly Comic Alive, a seinen manga magazine by Media Factory.  
  
————————————————————————————————————————————  
  
**Chapters 54-74 already available by official release and they will therefore not be available here.**

Dahye was forced to grow up in a cult by her mother, cut off from the rest of the world. However, she meets a half-sister her age named Yunseo, who is her polar opposite, and meets new people.
description.ko:
어릴 때부터 엄마에게 이끌려 사이비종교에 들어갔던 주인공 다혜는 세상과 단절되어 살다가 
자신과 정반대 성격의 동갑내기 이복자매 윤서와 여러 사람들을 만나게 된다.

description.en:
"I didn’t marry my wife because I loved her. I just signed a contract with her at her request."
I actually knew the truth, so it’s not his fault. I was the one who developed false expectations. I had spent three years as his wife. and I tried hard to be the right woman for him, but I couldn’t get a piece of his heart.
"I didn’t know it would last this long. It’s annoying."
I was nothing to him to the extent that he all but forgot about me as soon as the heroine appeared. In the end, she was always going to be the main character and I was always going to be an extra. No matter how hard I try, my role isn't changing. So it’s only right for me to leave.
"I’m sorry I’ve been bothering you all this time. Please be happy with her."
description.ko: 아슬란의 아내로 지냈던 3년. 그에게 어울리는 여자가 되려고 무던히 노력했으나, 그의 마음을 얻을 수 없었다. 소설 속 여자 주인공이 나타나자마자 버려질 정도로, 나는 그에게 아무것도 아닌 존재였다. 주인공은 주인공, 엑스트라는 엑스트라. 아무리 애를 써도 나는 고작해야 귀찮은 엑스트라에 불과할 뿐. 그러니까 내가 떠나는 게 맞는 것이다.
description.tr: Siz Aşıkken ben aslında gerçeği biliyordum. “Karımla onu sevdiğim için evlenmedim.” Yani bu onun hatası değildi. Yanlış beklentilere sahip olmak benim hatamdı. “Onunla sadece ihtiyaçlara dayalı bir sözleşme imzaladım.” Karısı olarak üç yıl. Onun için doğru kadın olmak için çok uğraştım ama kalbinden bir parça alamadım. “Bu kadar uzun süreceğini bilmiyordum. Sinir bozucu.” Kadın kahraman ortaya çıkar çıkmaz bir kenara atıldığım ölçüde onun için bir hiçtim. Sonunda, ana karakter ana karakterdi ve figüran da figürandı. Ne kadar uğraşırsam uğraşayım, ben sadece sinir bozucu bir figürandım. Rolüm değişmedi. Bu yüzden ayrılmak benim için doğru. “Bunca zaman seni rahatsız ettiğim için özür dilerim. Lütfen onunla mutlu ol.”

altTitles.ja: 安達としまむら

description.en: In the middle of the school day, on the second floor of the gym. This is where the two came to skip class, and it's where their friendship began. A story of two high school girls, playing ping-pong and chatting as they spend the heydays of their youth.
description.ja: 入間人間が書く電撃文庫の大人気作品『安達としまむら』。TVアニメ化決定の本作を新鋭・柚原もけがコミカライズ！女子校生2人のゆる～い日常をご堪能ください。
description.ru: В середине учебного дня, на втором этаже спортзала. Именно туда эти двое пришли пропустить занятия, и именно там началась их дружба.

altTitles.ja: やぎさん郵便

description.en: University student Hirose Kiyotaka finds a love letter tucked into the pages of a borrowed book. While attempting to return the letter, he encounters the charismatic Hanashiro Seiji and quickly becomes involved with him. As their tentative relationship develops, however, he finds himself wondering how serious Hanashiro's feelings for him really are. Meanwhile, the letter falls into the hands of Hanashiro's colleague Sawa Jinichiro, who entraps its writer, Arihara Mineo. Sawa's actions are seemingly ruthless, but his true motives regarding Arihara are far from clear.

altTitles.ja: ギルティサークル

description.en: April! Sawaya Doji's college life at his dream school of Seio University starts with an encounter with the beautiful Kaede Hoshimi during the club recruiting fair. Sawaya believes that if he goes to Tokyo... if he joins a university... if he joins a club, he can get a girlfriend! It's a great way to meet new people, but what kind of club has he gotten himself into?
description.ja: ４月！憧れの青応大学へと入学した大学１年生・沢屋童二は、サークル勧誘期に美少女・星見楓と出会う。「東京に行けば…大学に入れば…サークルに入れば、彼女ができる！」と信じる沢屋は星見楓とともに派手目なサークルの新歓コンパへと参加するが……。沢屋が足を踏み入れたサークルの罪深き実態、秘密とは何か！？
description.pt-br: Abril! A vida universitária de Sawaya Doji em sua escola de sonho da Universidade de Seio começa com um encontro com a bela Kaede Hoshimi durante a feira de recrutamento do clube. Sawaya acredita que se ele for para Tóquio... se ele entrar em uma universidade... se ele entrar em um clube, ele pode conseguir uma namorada! É uma ótima maneira de conhecer novas pessoas, mas em que tipo de clube ele se meteu?

title.en: Zettai ni Yuuwaku sarenai Otoko VS Zettai ni Yuuwaku suru Onna

altTitles.ja: 絶対に誘惑されない男vs絶対に誘惑する女

altTitles.en: A Man Who Can't Be Tempted VS A Woman Who Tempts Perfectly

altTitles.vi: Chuyên gia né thính vs. Bậc thầy thả thính

description.en: Reishi Kiyota, a ronin student, has a phobia of love due to a traumatic experience and has never been with a woman in his life. His neighbor, Aika Toyokawa, an office worker, likes Reishi and tries to seduce him with all her might..!
description.ja:
**「絶対に誘惑してあげるーーだから早く私に堕ちて♡」**

隣に住んでいるお姉さんがある日突然誘惑してきた！？

浪人生の清田玲史はトラウマから恋愛恐怖症を抱え、女性とは縁のない生活を送っていた。
アパートの隣人であるOL・豊川愛香はそんな玲史を気に入り、持ち前のあざとさを駆使しあの手この手で玲史を誘惑していくのだった…！

ちょっぴりえっちな、ほこたてラブコメディ♡

altTitles.ja: アイドル辞めるけど結婚してくれますか!?

altTitles.en: Will You Marry Me Because I Quit Being an Idol?

altTitles.pt-br: Estou deixando de ser uma Idol, mas você se casaria comigo!?

altTitles.ja-ro: Idol Yameru kedo Kekkon Shite Kuremasu ka!?

altTitles.vi: Anh Sẽ Kết Hôn Với Em Nếu Em Từ Bỏ Việc Trở Thành Thần Tượng Chứ?

description.en:
Sato Itto, an ordinary salaryman, has been shy about love due to an old trauma. Then one day, a reunion is held for the first time in several years. While they are having a good time talking about the good old days, suddenly Hebo, who has become an idol currently on hiatus, decides to attend the reunion!

Sato is upset to see Hebo, who was his first love. He manages to get over it with the help of alcohol, which he does not normally drink. When he wakes up, he finds the two of them naked in the same bed. As Sato desperately tries to recall his memories, Hebo shockingly says to him...!

"Marry me..."

What will happen to the marriage between the two who have no experience with love...!?
description.ja:
いたって普通のサラリーマンの佐藤一途（さとういっと）は昔のトラウマで恋に奥手になっていた。そんなある日、数年ぶりに同窓会が開かれることに。昔話に花を咲かせていると、急にアイドル休止ほやほやの枦保（へぼ）さんが出席することに!? 初恋の人だった枦保さんを前に動揺する佐藤。普段の飲まないお酒の力を借りてなんとか乗り切るも目を覚ますと同じベッドに裸の二人。必死に記憶を思い出そうとする佐藤に枦保さんから衝撃の一言が…！

「結婚して…」

恋愛偏差値0同士の結婚の行方は果たして―――！？
description.pt-br:
Sato Itto, um assalariado comum, tem sido tímido em relação ao amor devido a um trauma antigo. Então, um dia, uma reunião é realizada pela primeira vez em vários anos. Enquanto eles se divertem conversando sobre os bons e velhos tempos, de repente Hebo, que se tornou uma Idol que está atualmente em hiato, decide participar da reunião!

Sato fica chateado ao ver Hebo, que foi seu primeiro amor. Ele consegue superar isso com a ajuda de álcool, que normalmente não bebe. Quando acorda, encontra os dois nus na mesma cama. Enquanto Sato tenta desesperadamente se lembrar de suas memórias, Hebo lhe diz, de forma chocante...!

“Se case comigo...”

O que acontecerá com o casamento entre os dois que não têm experiência com o amor...?

title.en: Ore no Choukyou Skill ga Nanka Hen

altTitles.ja: 俺の調教スキルがなんか変

altTitles.en: There's Something Wrong with My Training Skills

description.en:
Takashi, a beast tamer who can't use his training skill well, is constantly suffering rebellion by his beasts. However, on a particular occasion, his skill is activated! For some reason, the companion it worked on was a girl!? It's a beast taming x pitiful heroine erotic fantasy adventure!

(Source: Futabasha, translated)
description.zh: 无法顺利使用调教技能的御兽使阿隆，过着每天都被魔兽欺负的日子。但是在某个契机下他觉醒了自己的技能!为什么这个技能只对女孩子有效？！

title.en: How to Survive as a Maid in a Horror Game

altTitles.en: Surviving as a Maid in a Horror Game

description.en:
"How did you know? I hid it well so that no one would find out."
 
Adrian Caesar von de Paltzgraf, the successor to the Paltzgraf Family. He is hailed as an angel in this world, but only I knew that the serial murders and murder attempts happening in the area which everyone was talking about were all committed by a young, good-looking gentleman.

[Adrian's murderous intent has increased.]
[Convince Adrian to lower his murderous intent. If not, you die.]
[Adrian's murderous intent is at 92%.]

I am the only one who knows. I was the only one who transmigrated into the world of this ridiculous horror game.

---

Note:
- Only Ridibooks has all the volumes, due to Volume 1 of the side stories being R19.
- "No Exit Horror" is the English name on the ebook and physical Korean novel cover.

I like you who can have sex anyone.

altTitles.en: I Like You Who Can Have Sex With Anyone

altTitles.vi: Crush Của Tôi Là Một Đứa Lẳng Lơ

altTitles.es-la: Me Gustas tú, que Puedes tener Sexo con Cualquiera

altTitles.pt-br: Eu goste de você, que pode fazer sexo com qualquer um

description.en:
Gotou, a virgin high school boy, has a crush on his affectionate gal classmate, Agawa. But one day after school, he catches Agawa having sex with Takayama in an empty classroom. Gotou is devastated, but he soon learns that not only did she have sex with Takayama, Agawa is a slut who'll have sex with anyone who asks. Even…‽
___
**Note:** After the release of Chapter 35, author Takeda Super decided to take the story in a new, different direction, so Chapters 31–35 were retconned and new chapters were drawn. However, for fans that enjoyed the original timeline, the old chapters were later compiled into [their own volume](https://mangadex.org/title/b782186f-60d9-4f6c-b050-7b21013040ff) that even included an additional chapter in that timeline.

**Alternative Official Raws:**
- [Comic DAYS](https://comic-days.com/episode/4856001361135826437)
- [MagaPoke](https://pocket.shonenmagazine.com/episode/4856001361243117705)
description.ja: 童貞高校生のゴトウが好きになったのはセックス大好きなギャル・アガワさん。ある日の放課後、彼女が同級生とセックスしているところを見てしまって──。
description.vi: Con đũy tình yêu đã dẫn nam chính của ta đi thích một gyaru lẳng lơ sẵn sàng làm nháy với bất cứ ai. Rồi anh main sẽ làm gì trước cái tình huống NTR nhưng không hẳn này? Khuyến cáo ko dành cho trẻ dưới 18 và các thanh niên không thích NTR. Đọc truyện này đừng lắp đầu trên vào làm gì (lắp đầu dưới thì OK).
description.es-la: Un virgen estudiante de secundaria, por casualidad descubre a la gal de la que se estaba empezando a enamorar teniendo sexo con otro estudiante.
description.pt-br: Uma Gal safada que deixa todo mundo transar com ela e um garoto virgem do ensino médio apaixonado por ela, mesmo depois de vê-la transar com seu colega de classe.

title.en: Watashi no Kokoro wa Oji-san de Aru

altTitles.ja: 私の心はおじさんである

altTitles.en: My Heart Is an Old Man
This Alluring Dark Elf Has the Heart of a Middle-Aged Man!

description.en: "Haruka Yamagishi" is a guy who has no friends or family and just goes back and forth between work and home. One day, when he wakes up, he finds himself in a different world. And for some reason, he's turned into a beautiful dark elf! Now, Haruka has inexhaustible magic power, a sturdy body, and a new life where she can do anything... However, through the friends she met and her activities as an adventurer, changes slowly began to take place. The guy who gave up on life in this world begins to feel what it's like to live.
description.ja: 友人、恋人、家族もおらず惰性で生きる生活を続けていた遥だったが、ある日目を覚ますと美少女ダークエルフの姿で異世界にいた！新しい環境にワクワクを抑えきれないハルカ。しかし、色々なものを諦め、年下や女性との交流に怯えていたおじさんが急に無双なんてできる訳もなく……。
description.es-la: "Haruka Yamagishi" es un tio que no tiene amigos ni familia y sólo va y viene entre el trabajo y su casa. Un día, cuando se despierta, se encuentra en un mundo diferente. Además, por alguna razón, ¡se ha convertido en una hermosa elfa oscura! Ahora, Haruka tiene un poder mágico inagotable, un cuerpo robusto y una nueva vida en la que puede hacer cualquier cosa....Sin embargo, a través de sus amigos que conoció y sus actividades como aventurera, poco a poco empezaron a surgir cambios.Al tio que renunció a la vida, en este mundo empieza a sentir lo que es vivir. Aunque hay algunas trampas y otros eventos, ¡Es una historia de aventuras conmovedora!

altTitles.es: El esclavo de la élite de soldados de Mato

altTitles.en: Slave of the Magic Capital's Elite Troops

altTitles.ja: 魔都精兵のスレイブ

altTitles.vi: Nô lệ của đội tinh nhuệ Ma đô

description.en:
The demon-filled dimension known as "Mato" has opened to threaten humanity, and a type of "peach" tree that grows there yields fruit that confers special powers to those who eat it, giving humanity a fighting chance, but this only works for women. As such, as protectors of humanity, women rise in social status while men are relegated to second-class citizens scraping for basic occupation and acknowledgment.   
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, a domestically crafty and laborious high school senior whose older sister was taken during a Mato event 5 years before; while lamenting the hardships of the life ahead of him, an event opens before him, and while being rescued from demons by Captain Kyouka of the Anti-Demon Corps, she confers him powers as her "slave" and turns him into a mighty beast mount that mows down the demons.   
  
However, there is a surprising price to pay for being her "slave"… and it's not him who has to pay it.
description.fr:
La dimension démoniaque connue sous le nom de "Mato" s'est ouverte pour menacer l'humanité, et une sorte de "pêcher" qui y pousse donne des fruits qui confèrent des pouvoirs spéciaux à ceux qui les mangent, donnant à l'humanité une chance de se battre, mais cela ne fonctionne que pour les femmes. Ainsi, en tant que protectrices de l'humanité, les femmes gagnent en statut social tandis que les hommes sont relégués à des citoyens de seconde zone qui se battent pour une occupation et une reconnaissance de base.  
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, une lycéenne rusée et laborieuse dont la sœur aînée a été enlevée lors d'un événement du Mato 5 ans auparavant ; alors qu'elle se lamente sur les difficultés de la vie qui l'attend, un événement s'ouvre devant elle, et alors qu'elle est sauvée des démons par le capitaine Kyouka du Corps Anti-Démon, elle lui confère ses pouvoirs d'"esclave" et le transforme en un puissant monticule animal qui fauche les démons.  
  
Cependant, il y a un prix surprenant à payer pour être son "esclave"… et ce n'est pas lui qui doit le payer.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/takemura4hey/)
description.ru:
Эта боевая фентезийная манга повествует о нескольких героинях, что защищают людей в альтернативном пространстве, именуемом Мато (Город Демонов).  


---
description.vi:
Chiều không gian đầy quỷ dữ được gọi là "Ma đô" đã mở ra đe dọa đối với loài người. Tại đó, có một loài  "đào" ban cho kẻ ăn sức mạnh đặc biệt, giúp nhân loại có cơ hội chiến đấu, tuy nhiên, chỉ có nữ giới mới có thể sử dụng thứ sức mạnh "trái đào" ấy. Bởi vậy mà phụ nữ trở thành những người bảo vệ loài người, địa vị xã hội tăng cao, trong khi nam giới bị giáng xuống tầng lớp công dân hạng hai, giành giật nhau những công việc cơ bản và sự thừa nhận.

Nhân vật chính Yuuki Wakura, một nam sinh chăm chỉ yêu nội trợ, chị gái cậu đã bị bắt trong một sự kiện của Ma đô 5 năm về trước. Khi đang than thở về những khó khăn gặp phải, cậu đã bị lũ quỷ tấn công. Nhờ được đội trưởng Kyouka của Đội chống Quỷ kịp thời ứng cứu, cậu chấp nhận trở thành "nô lệ" của cô để có thể sở hữu sức mạnh tiêu diệt bầy quỷ.

Bất ngờ thay, việc làm "nô lệ" đòi hỏi một cái giá tương xứng...và người phải trả giá lại không phải là cậu.
description.pt-br:
A dimensão cheia de demônios conhecida como "Mato" se abriu para ameaçar a humanidade, e uma espécie de "pessegueiro" que ali cresce produz frutos que conferem poderes especiais a quem os come, dando à humanidade uma chance de lutar, mas isso só funciona para mulheres. Como tal, como protetoras da humanidade, as mulheres ascendem no estatuto social, enquanto os homens são relegados a cidadãos de segunda classe, em busca de uma ocupação básica e de reconhecimento.

 Yuuki Wakura é um estudante do último ano do ensino médio, astuto e trabalhoso, cuja irmã mais velha foi raptada durante um evento em Mato, 5 anos antes; enquanto lamenta as dificuldades da vida que tem pela frente, um evento se abre diante dele, e ao ser resgatado dos demônios pela Capitã Kyouka do Corpo Anti-Demônio, ela confere a ele poderes como seu "escravo" e o transforma em uma poderosa montaria bestial. que destrói os demônios.

No entanto, há um preço surpreendente a pagar por ele ser seu “escravo”… e não é ele quem tem que pagar.

altTitles.ja: むげんのじゅにん
無限の住人

description.en:
"To end his eternal suffering, he must slay one thousand enemies!" Manji, a ronin warrior of feudal Japan, has been cursed with immortality. To rid himself of this curse and end his life of misery, he must slay one thousand evil men! His quest begins when a young girl seeks his help in taking revenge on her parents' killers… and his quest won't end until the blood of a thousand has spilled!  

[Official English](https://digital.darkhorse.com/series/373/blade-of-the-immortal)
 
--- 
- **Won the 1st Japan Media Arts Award Division Excellence Prize**

---
  
AnimeNewsNetwork Links:  
[Anime](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=9691)  
[Live-Action Movie](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=18861)
description.es: Asano Rin, una chica que jura vengarse de los Itto Ryu, un grupo de espadachines que mataron a su padre y secuestraron a su madre, contrata a Manji, un espadachín conocido como los "El asesino de los 100" y que tiene un cuerpo inmortal gracias a un parásito llamado bicho Kessenchu, como su guardián y comienza un viaje para perseguir al líder de los Itto Ryu. Comienza un viaje en busca de su archienemigo, Amatsu Kagehisa, el líder de la escuela Itto.
description.ja: 父を殺し、母を攫（さら）った剣客集団『逸刀流（いっとうりゅう）』に復讐を誓う少女・浅野 凜（あさのりん）は、「百人斬り」の異名を持ち、己の身体に血仙蟲（けっせんちゅう）という虫を寄生させることで不死の肉体を持った剣士・万次（まんじ）を用心棒として雇い、逸刀流の統主である宿敵・天津影久（あのつかげひさ）を追う旅を始める――。
description.es-la: Asano Rin, una chica que jura vengarse de los Itto Ryu, un grupo de espadachines que mataron a su padre y secuestraron a su madre, contrata a Manji, un espadachín conocido como los "El asesino de los 100" y que tiene un cuerpo inmortal gracias a un parásito llamado bicho Kessenchu, como su guardián y comienza un viaje para perseguir al líder de los Itto Ryu. Comienza un viaje en busca de su archienemigo, Amatsu Kagehisa, el líder de la escuela Itto.
description.pt-br: Manji é um espadachim imortal, que foi amaldiçoado com a vida eterna. Ele cresceu cansado de viver com toda a morte que ele criou. Ele não tem outras habilidades, a não ser as que trazem a morte, assim ele faz um plano para recuperar sua mortalidade: ele deve matar cem homens maus para cada homem bom que ele matou. A velha bruxa que amaldiçoou Manji com a imortalidade se compromete a tirá-la de Manji por tal condição, e para isso ele terá que matar mil homens maus. Em sua jornada, ele conhece uma jovem garota, Rin, que tem a sua própria vingança contra a procurar a escola de espadachins cujos membros mataram a família Rin. Rin e Manji entram junto numa jornada, cada um com a esperança de encontrar algum tipo de paz. Em seu caminho muitos inimigos aparecem, Rin e Manji estão quase constantemente sob ataque e devem aprender a viver suas vidas, evitando serem consumidos pela vingança.

title.en: Watashi to Kanojo no Kawaii Koi no Hajime Kata

altTitles.en: How My Cute Girlfriend and I Started a Love Story

altTitles.ja: 私と彼女のかわいい恋のはじめ方
叛逆（はんぎゃく）のニジガサキ
反逆のニジガサキ

description.en: Hangyaku no Nijigasaki (Nijigasaki of the Rebellion) is an official Love Live! manga by Choboraunyopomi featuring the cast of Love Live!'s Nijigasaki High School Idol Club.
description.es-la: Las locuras y bizarras jornadas de Nijigasaki, ahora llegan en formato manga. Sigue las rebeldes aventuras de Setsuna Yuki y el Club Escolar Idol de Nijigasaki en Hangyaku no Nijigasaki.

title.en: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo!

altTitles.en: God's Blessing on This Wonderful World!

altTitles.ru: Да будет благословенен этот прекрасный мир!

altTitles.th: ขอให้โชคดีมีชัยในโลกแฟนตาซี

altTitles.ja: この素晴らしい世界に祝福を！

altTitles.zh: 为美好的世界献上祝福！

description.en: Kazuma Sato is a video game-loving shut-in-or at least he was, until a humiliating traffic accident brings his young life to an untimely end. But after his death, a beautiful girl claiming to be a goddess invites him to enter another world and gain some respectable perks in the process. But Kazuma’s choice is going to have serious consequences for the goddess and the dead man alike…
description.es:
Kazuma Sato es un hikikomori que disfruta como un bellaco con los videojuegos, el manga y el anime. Un día decide salir de su casa, sufre un desafortunado accidente y fallece. Cuál es su sorpresa al ver que aparece en un limbo junto a una diosa llamada Aqua que le ofrece enviarlo a un nuevo mundo con tintes roleros y -además- concederle un deseo. Pero antes, Aqua se ocupa de humillarlo porque la muerte que él pensaba que había sido heroica salvando a una chica de ser atropellada, resulta ser lo más patética y cutre que te puedas echar a la cara. Lo único que se le ocurre al bueno de Kazuma es usar su deseo para que Aqua lo acompañe al nuevo mundo y se una a él en sus peripecias para derrotar al Rey Demonio.

En su nueva aventura encontrará una gran variedad de personajes a cada cual más cazurro, formando equipo con la pesada de Aqua, con Megumin, una maga loca por las explosiones y con Darkness, una paladín aficionada al sadomasoquismo. Viendo que su equipo está mal de la cabeza y que todas son más tontas que un zapato, Kazuma decide disfrutar de su nueva vida a lo grande, pero al final se las tendrá que ver con los generales del Rey Demonio que se cruzarán en su camino… y con sapos, un montón de babosos batracios.
description.ru: Кадзума Сато - хиккикомори, закоренелый фанат игр, аниме и манги. В какой-то момент, в попытке спасти человека он попадает в дорожную катастрофу и его жизнь обрывается. Казалось бы жизнь закончилась? Но Кадзума просыпается и видит перед собой красавицу, которая называет себя богиней. Она спрашивает, хочет ли он отправиться в другой мир? С условием, что он может взять с собой только одну вещь. Кадзума сразу же желает взять с собой богиню. Так и начинается его невероятное приключение против короля демонов, но перед этим нужно заняться другими делами. Например, найти пищу, одежду и убежище. Кадзума хочет жить в мире и спокойствия, но богиня находит одну проблему за другой. А кроме того, армия демонов имеет какие-то свои виды на него.
description.pt-br: A vida de Satou Kazuma, um hikikomori que gosta de jogos, muito em breve chegou ao fim por causa de um acidente de trânsito... Deveria ser, mas quando ele acorda, uma linda deusa aparece diante de seus olhos. "Ei, eu tenho algo um pouco agradável para você. Quer ir para outro mundo? Você pode desejar apenas uma coisa de sua escolha junto com você." "Então eu irei levá-la." Daqui em diante, a grande aventura de subjugar o Rei Demônio começará para Kazuma reencarnado, ou assim se poderia pensar, mas é o trabalho para a obter alimentos, roupas e abrigo começa! Apesar de Kazuma querer viver em paz, a deusa acaba causando problemas, um após outro, e eventualmente, eles atraem a atenção do exército do Rei Demônio.

altTitles.fr: Coma héroïque dans un autre monde

altTitles.ja: 異世界おじさん

description.en: Having survived an isekai for 17 years, 34 year old Ojisan (uncle) returns to modern day Japan. Takafumi, Ojisan's nephew, now gets to witness what throwing a diehard Sega fan into an isekai for 17 years does to various things and people, both past and present.

title.en: Souzou Renkinjutsushi wa Jiyuu wo Ouka suru: Kokyou wo Tsuihou saretara, Maou no Ohizamoto de Chouzetsu Kouka no Magic Item Tsukuri-houdai ni Narimashita

altTitles.ja: 創造錬金術師は自由を謳歌する 故郷を追放されたら、魔王のお膝元で超絶効果のマジックアイテム作り放題になりました

altTitles.en: The Creation Alchemist Enjoys Freedom: If I Am Exiled From My Hometown, I Can Make Magic Items With Transcendent Effects at the Knees of the Demon Lord

description.en: Thor Regus, a boy who lived in the empire, was banished to the territory of the Demon Lord by the hands of his father, the Duke. The reason was that he could only use [Alchemy] and didn’t have any combat skills. The empire was a military country, and those without combat skills were discriminated against. That is why the Empire decided to make him a hostage and sacrifice to the Demon Territory.
description.ja: 心優しいトールは錬金術の能力を家でも職場でも全く認められず、遂には魔王の生け贄として人間領を追われることに。だが、理知的な魔王に持ち前の物作りへの情熱を認められ、材料や権限も思い通り貰えてしまい…！？
description.pt-br:
Thor Regus, um garoto que vivia no império, foi banido para o território do Lorde Demônio pelas mãos de seu pai, o Duque.

A razão era que ele só podia usar [Alquimia] e não tinha nenhuma habilidade de combate.

O império era um país militar e aqueles que não tinham habilidades de combate eram discriminados.

É por isso que o Império decidiu torná-lo refém e sacrificá-lo ao Território Demoníaco.

Esta é a história de um garoto exilado que transcende Impérios e Heróis e transforma o Território Demoníaco em um poder civilizado.

altTitles.ja: ドラマクイン

description.en: After saving Earth, aliens have taken up residence with the humans in Japan. Nomamoto, a factory worker with an abusive alien boss, one day meets Kitami, who tells her his own family was killed by aliens. The two quickly forge a friendship, but one day Kitami does the unthinkable…
description.id: Setelah menyelamatkan Bumi, para alien tinggal bersama manusia di Jepang. Nomamoto, seorang pekerja pabrik dengan bos alien yang kejam, suatu hari bertemu dengan Kitami, yang mengatakan bahwa keluarganya sendiri dibunuh oleh alien. Keduanya dengan cepat menjalin persahabatan, tetapi suatu hari Kitami melakukan hal yang tidak terpikirkan...
description.ja: <毎週月曜更新>宇宙人が地球を救ってから、人間と宇宙人が共に住むようになった日本。工場で宇宙人の上司にこき使われるノマモトは、家族を宇宙人に殺されたという北見と出会う。仲を深める2人だが、ある日北見がとんでもないことをしてしまい…
description.ru: Пришельцы спасли Землю и обосновались с людьми в Японии. Номамото, работающая на фабрике с отвратительным боссом-пришельцем, однажды встречает Китами, который рассказывает ей, что семью его убили пришельцы. Между ними быстро возникает дружба, но однажды Китами совершает немыслимое...
description.uk: Після порятунку Землі прибульцями, Японія стала спільним домом для них та людей. Номото, яка змушена терпіти знущання від свого боса-прибульця на заводі, зустрічає Кітамі, чиє серце розбите втратою сім'ї, вбитої прибульцями. Між ними виникає щира дружба, яка переходить до здійснення їх бажань... винищення всіх прибульців...
description.pt-br: Após salvar a Terra, os alienígenas passaram a viver com os humanos no Japão. Nomamoto, uma operária de fábrica com um chefe alienígena abusivo, um dia conhece Kitami, que conta que sua própria família foi morta por alienígenas. Os dois rapidamente formam uma amizade, mas um dia Kitami faz o impensável…
